Visiting Thailand

Whether your goal is to learn how to be happier, seek more wisdom in life, find solace in this chaotic world, or drop by just to say "Hi," you are more than welcome to come to Thailand and stay at my house. I'll be happy to take you around Bangkok and introduce you to places and people of Thailand that I hope will leave inspired.
